metadata.Title: CVE-2016-6187 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The apparmor_setprocattr function in security/apparmor/lsm.c in the Linux kernel before 4.6.5 does not validate the buffer size, which allows local users to gain privileges by triggering an AppArmor setprocattr hook.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6187` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.8.0-36-generic - 4.8.0-36.36~16.04.1
linux-image-4.8.0-36-generic-lpae - 4.8.0-36.36~16.04.1
linux-image-4.8.0-36-lowlatency - 4.8.0-36.36~16.04.1
linux-image-extra-4.8.0-36-generic - 4.8.0-36.36~16.04.1
No subscription required
